meanings.sent1: The antisolar side of the building remained cool throughout the day.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the opposite side of the sun.
meanings.sent1: The antisolar telescope allowed astronomers to observe celestial bodies from a unique perspective.
meanings.sent2: The spacecraft was equipped with special sensors to detect antisolar radiation.
meanings.sent3: The antisolar sunglasses protected his eyes from the glare coming from the other side of the sun.
meanings.sent4: Her antisolar outlook on life brought a different light to every situation.
meanings.sent5: The antisolar phenomenon fascinated scientists studying the mysteries of space.

meanings.sent1: The antisolar trajectory of the comet puzzled astronomers as it veered off in an unexpected direction.
meanings.sent2: The satellite was programmed to orbit in an antisolar direction for research purposes.
meanings.sent3: The antisolar wind carried particles away from the solar system.
meanings.sent4: Her antisolar journey led her to uncharted territories beyond the reach of the sun.
meanings.sent5: The antisolar escape plan involved navigating through the darkness away from the sun's influence.
